channel.title: Server Help
channel.description:
COMPLETE EDIT.
Hey guys i am having an issue with XP Rates. So say i chose Easy i get 2k xp per hit. I log out and log back in, and now i only get 1xp. Can someone help me fix this please!! Tried Everything!
